so you don't want to transfer all this data back to your central cloud to process that it's a

you want your processing job on the edge side so you can have an instant result
to process data also the data privacy for example if you are a
manufacturer factory you don't want to upload your raw data back to the cloud in case
there's a security issues you don't want to i mean to expose your data to the public
